name: Homeland:The Revolution
description:
Story & Summary:

After the Civil War, The country saw itself reclaim all the territories it had lost to the rebels. This event shaped the country and surprisingly the country began to flourish.There was peace although very short-lived as a group called the Revolution aims to bring destruction and chaos to the country once again.They amass both wealth and a following in a very short amount of time all while bringing destruction and chaos to their surrondings.
Expect updates very soon :)

Thanks for reading :)

Feel free to leave a comment below :)
